    public class JWTTokenIssuer
extends OauthTokenIssuerImpl

      • getAccessTokenHash

        public String getAccessTokenHash(String accessToken)
                          throws org.apache.oltu.oauth2.common.exception.OAuthSystemException
        Description copied from interface: OauthTokenIssuer
        This is used to generate a hash of the access token. Eg. when JWTTokenIssuer is used, use JWTID as the hash
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Access Token
        Returns:
        hash of the access token
        Throws:
        org.apache.oltu.oauth2.common.exception.OAuthSystemException - OAuthSystemException OAuth System Exception.

        Returns:

                  throws IdentityOAuth2Exception

      • signJWTWithRSA

        protected String signJWTWithRSA(com.nimbusds.jwt.JWTClaimsSet jwtClaimsSet,
                                OAuthTokenReqMessageContext tokenContext,
                                OAuthAuthzReqMessageContext authorizationContext)
                         throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        Sign the JWT token with RSA (SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512) algorithm.
        Parameters:
        jwtClaimsSet - JWT claim set to be signed.
        tokenContext - Token context if available.
        authorizationContext - Authorization context if available.
        Returns:
        Signed JWT token.
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception

      • mapSignatureAlgorithm

        protected com.nimbusds.jose.JWSAlgorithm mapSignatureAlgorithm(String signatureAlgorithm)
                                                        throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        This method map signature algorithm define in identity.xml to nimbus signature algorithm format, Strings are defined inline hence there are not being used any where
        Parameters:
        signatureAlgorithm - Signature algorithm.
        Returns:
        JWS algorithm.
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - Unsupported signature algorithm.

      • createJWTClaimSet

        protected com.nimbusds.jwt.JWTClaimsSet createJWTClaimSet(OAuthAuthzReqMessageContext authAuthzReqMessageContext,
                                                          OAuthTokenReqMessageContext tokenReqMessageContext,
                                                          String consumerKey)
                                                   throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        Create a JWT claim set according to the JWT format.
        Parameters:
        authAuthzReqMessageContext - Oauth authorization request message context.
        tokenReqMessageContext - Token request message context.
        consumerKey - Consumer key of the application.
        Returns:
        JWT claim set.
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception
